statements: SELECT * FROM CloudDataProtection;
SELECT user_id, data_type, action_type FROM CloudDataProtection;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, data_type, action_type, date_time FROM CloudDataProtection ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, data_type, action_type, date_time FROM CloudDataProtection WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, data_type, action_type FROM CloudDataProtection WHERE data_type = 'Sensitive';
SELECT * FROM CloudDataProtection WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, data_type FROM CloudDataProtection WHERE data_type LIKE '%backup%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CloudDataProtection WHERE action_type IN ('encrypt', 'decrypt') ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM CloudDataProtection GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5;
SELECT user_id, action_type, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM CloudDataProtection GROUP BY user_id, action_type ORDER BY user_id ASC, total_actions DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_audit_log WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, activity_type, timestamp FROM data_audit_log WHERE activity_type = 'edit';
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM data_audit_log WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_affected, timestamp FROM data_audit_log WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_analysis WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, activity_type FROM data_audit_log WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(id) AS total_activities FROM data_audit_log GROUP BY activity_type;
SELECT * FROM data_audit_log WHERE data_affected LIKE '%financial%';
SELECT id, analysis_type FROM security_analysis WHERE investigator_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM log_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, activity_type, user_id FROM log_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT data_accessed, timestamp FROM log_data WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE event_type = 'Error' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT log_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM log_data WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT audit_id, event_type, event_description, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 200 AND event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY audit_id ASC
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, result, timestamp FROM security_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'Malware Scan' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp, data_accessed FROM log_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_description, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM log_data;
SELECT user_id, event_type FROM log_data WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_info WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT action_type, data_accessed FROM data_access_log WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM log_data;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM log_data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_info WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT log_id, action_type FROM audit_log ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT MAX(log_id) AS max_log_id FROM data_access_log;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, log_message FROM audit_logs WHERE activity_type='login';
SELECT data_name, data_type, encryption_key FROM data_protection ORDER BY data_name DESC;
SELECT investigation_id, case_number, investigator_id FROM investigation WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analyst_id, analysis_date, findings, recommendation FROM security_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_message, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE activity_type = 'login' LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email, access_level FROM user_data WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT data_name, is_encrypted FROM data_protection WHERE data_type = 'financial';
SELECT analysis_date, findings FROM security_analysis WHERE analyst_id = 200 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
